name: Site Establishment Checklist
Any relevant dilapidation requirements captured
Attach relevant site establishment photos/ documents
Appropriate isolation of site (hoardings / fencing)
Sufficient & Appropriate site/H&S signage erected
Site establishment completed
Timber Framing (Audit)
Approval given to install timber framing
Dimensions / locations checked and accurate
All frames are square
Frames are straight and level
Fixings are correct
Any bracing requirements installed
Any additional photos, comments and observations
Trades QA received, attached, reviewed and approved
Raise Remedial / Request trades QA / Signoff
All framing completed correctly within tolerance in respective area
Site Concrete Checklist
Excavation depth and location checked and correct
Ground conditions acceptable
Concrete specifications checked, correct and delivery docket photographed
Site concrete placed
Placed by:
Concrete placed to the correct height
Site concrete pour completed and finish acceptable
Piling Pre-Start Checklist
Piles setout, surveyed and clearly marked
Accurate RL confirmed for piling reference
Acceptable site conditions and access for piling rig
Additional photos/ observations / reports attached
Approval given to commence piling
approval given to dig
relevant services identified and isolated / clearly marked
relevant information communicated to piling trade
any environmental requirements considered and enacted
Piling Checklist (Audit)
Trades QA received, attached, reviewed and approved
Relevant inspections completed and attached - any observations recorded and closed out
Piling spoil removed and work area left clean and tidy
Any additional completion/handover documents completed and attached
All piles completed (locations and heights checked and correct within tolerance)
